t: Abundance - Kindle edition by Klein, Ezra, Thompson, Derek. Politics & Social Sciences Kindle eBooks @ Amazon.com.
s: This is an excellent book about how people should change their thought process from scarcity to abundance. Think about what you want and then set a plan to achieve your goal or obtain what you want. Don't just wish for it; be active and overcome the obstacles that keep you from reaching your goals.
